Rosalie Edna Hopkins

  1. Adopted Name: Rosalie Catherine
  2. Adopted Family: Anton and Ella Evers
  3. Location of Family: St. Libory, NE

  5. Arrival Place: Grand Island, NE
  6. Age on Arrival: 3

  8. Gender: female
  9. Married Name: Rosella Catherine Murphy
